name: Choose your own Singapore
description:
This game is my submission to the Heritage Game Jam 2020. 

Choose your own Singapore is an alternate history text-based game, which covers the years of self-government leading up to independence. Embrace powerful and divergent ideas as you navigate the events of our island's history. What Singapore will you choose to create?

This game is a work of interactive fiction, and is not intended to be an accurate portrayal of history.

Note: The game as it currently exists (as a jam submission) is incomplete. The full game would incorporate Singaporean history from post-independence up to our contemporary period, and will be updated in the future to include this.
